# thunder_axdebug_exit (Resource)

`thunder_axdebug_exit`: exit from axdebug and stop capture

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_axdebug_exit" "thunder_axdebug_exit" {
  stop_capture = 0
}
```
